Class ExoView

java.lang.Object
ExoView
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ExoView
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener
GL2 context to render a movable 3D primitive.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ExoView​(ExoScene rs)
    Constructs a GL2 context for the provided scene.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init​(com.jogamp.opengl.GLAutoDrawable glDrawable)
      Called by the drawable immediately after the OpenGL2 context is initialized for the first time. Implementation from GLEventListener. Used to perform one-time OpenGL2 initializations.
      Specified by:
      init in interface com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener
      Parameters:
      glDrawable - GLAutoDrawable object.

    • display

      public void display​(com.jogamp.opengl.GLAutoDrawable glDrawable)
      Called by the drawable to initiate OpenGL2 rendering by the client. Implementation from GLEventListener. After all GLEventListeners have been notified of a display event, the drawable will swap its buffers if necessary.
      Specified by:
      display in interface com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener
      Parameters:
      glDrawable - GLAutoDrawable object.

    • reshape

      public void reshape​(com.jogamp.opengl.GLAutoDrawable glDrawable, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Called by the drawable during the first repaint after the component has been resized. Implementation from GLEventListener.
      Specified by:
      reshape in interface com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener
      Parameters:
      glDrawable - GLAutoDrawable object.
      x - X Coordinate of the viewport area.
      y - Y coordinate of the viewport area.
      width - new width of the window.
      height - new height of the window.

    • dispose

      public void dispose​(com.jogamp.opengl.GLAutoDrawable glDrawable)
      Called when the display mode has been changed. Implementation from GLEventListener.
      Specified by:
      dispose in interface com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener
